item.title: Solana On-Chain Meme Token AOL Reaches $20 Million Market Cap, Surging 171% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 15th, according to GMGN data, the Solana-based Meme token AOL (America Online) has reached a market capitalization of over $20 million. It has seen a 24-hour price increase of 171% and a 24-hour trading volume of $7 million.America Online was once a dial-up Internet services company, symbolizing the narrative of "retro innovation" in technology.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins usually lack practical use cases and experience significant price volatility. Therefore, investment should be made with caution.

item.title: DeFi Technologies Releases Q2 Financial Performance: Total Revenue Reaches $17.4 Million, Holding Approximately $26 Million in Digital Assets
item.description: On August 15th, according to the report by the Associated Press (AP), the U.S. listed company DeFi Technologies (Nasdaq: DEFT) disclosed its second-quarter financial results. This quarter's adjusted revenue reached $32.1 million. The adjusted Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation, and Amortization (EBITDA) was $21.6 million, which demonstrated the strong profitability of its core business. The total adjusted net income was $17.4 million.As of July 31, 2025, the assets under management (AUM) of the subsidiary Valour were approximately $772.8 million and had increased to $947 million, representing a 23% increase compared to the previous period. The company holds various digital assets with a total value of around $26 million.

item.title: Hyperliquid Whale Update: Continuously reducing ETH holdings, BTC short position floating loss of 9 million yet doubling down against the trend
item.description: On August 15th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight (accessible via https://t.me/HyperInsight), during the current market correction, some whales took the opportunity to adjust their positions.The whale whose address starts with 0x7fdaf continuously reduced its short position in ETH, reducing by $1.66 million and $7.79 million in the past 6 hours. It currently has a floating loss of approximately $5.27 million and a liquidation price of $7,304.The whale with an address beginning with 0x5d2f4, on the contrary, increased its short position in BTC, adding $853,000 to its position. It currently has a floating loss of $9.02 million and a liquidation price of $127,873.The whale with an address starting with 0x5648A reduced its long position in ETH, selling 830 ETH (approximately $3.95 million). It is currently experiencing a minor floating loss of $44,600 and a liquidation price of $4,091.

item.title: $4.6 billion worth of BTC and $1.3 billion worth of ETH options are set to expire today, with the maximum pain point at $11,800 and $4,000 respectively.
item.description: August 15th. Greek.Live analyst Adam disclosed today's options expiry data:39,000 BTC options reached their expiration. The Put Call Ratio was 0.95. The max pain was at $118,000, and the nominal value was $4.6 billion.280,000 ETH options expired. The Put Call Ratio was 1.04. The max pain was at $4000, and the nominal value was $1.3 billion.This week, BTC hit a new high, and ETH also reached a historical high near $4800. The market sentiment is extremely bullish. Nearly $6 billion in options expired this week, accounting for 9% of the current total open interest. On Thursday, Deribit's single-day options volume reached $10.9 billion. Looking at the major options data, in terms of implied volatility, BTC's IV remains low. The medium to short-term IV stays below 35%. While ETH's main term IV remains high at 70%, which matches the current potential volatility expectations for ETH. There have been many large trades recently. item.title: Binance Alpha's latest PUBLIC Airdrop single-ticket profit is approximately $31
item.description: On August 15th, based on market information, PublicAI (PUBLIC) has been listed on Binance Alpha. It is currently trading at $0.072, and its market capitalization is $14.3 million. Each eligible user can receive 430 PUBLIC tokens through an airdrop. The estimated value of the airdrop per eligible recipient at the current price is approximately $31.

item.title: Catizen is releasing its Mid-Year 2025 Recap and will launch the TON L2 GameChain
item.description: August 15th. Catizen unveiled its 2025 mid-year data: The total user base of the platform reached 63.4 million. Over 50 million CATI were collected this year, accounting for 15% of the total circulation. In May of this year, Catizen also secured a strategic investment from Animoca Brands. In the second half of the year, the ecosystem's Web3 games Cattea and Capybobo will undergo significant updates. Catizen will launch the TON L2 chain game public chain and hundreds of games, aiming to establish the world's largest game public chain.

item.title: In the past 2 hours, a newly created wallet withdrew 17,591 ETH from Kraken, worth $81.62 million
item.description: On August 15th, based on LookOnChain's monitoring, in the past 2 hours, there has been another new wallet making a withdrawal of 17,591 ETH from Kraken, which is worth $81.62 million.During the past 3 days, a total of two newly created wallets have withdrawn a combined total of 71,025 ETH from Kraken, with a value of $330 million.

item.title: Musk: Grok Soon to Have Speech Output Ability
item.description: On August 15th, Musk tweeted that "Grok will shortly possess speech output capabilities."

item.title: Pre-market Crypto Stocks in US Market Show Mixed Performance, with Bullish Up by 2.44%
item.description: On August 15th, based on the market data from RockFlow, the pre-market cryptocurrency stocks in the US showed mixed trends. These included:- The mining firm TeraWulf (WULF) decreased by 0.11%.- The cryptocurrency exchange platform Bullish (BLSH) increased by 2.44%.- Circle (CRCL) decreased by 0.77%.- Coinbase (COIN) increased by 0.55%.- MicroStrategy (MSTR) increased by 0.25%.- SharpLink Gaming (SBET) increased by 0.3%.- Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) increased by 2.06%.- The "IP Treasury Strategy" company Heritage Distilling (CASK) increased by 9.98%.

item.title: Dow Futures Up 0.7%, Intel Continues Pre-market rally
item.description: On August 15th, based on the market data from RockFlow, the S&P 500 Index Futures increased by 0.2%, the Nasdaq 100 Index Futures rose by 0.04%, and the Dow Jones Index Futures went up by 0.7%. Intel maintained its pre-market rally, rising by more than 4%. It closed up by 7.38% yesterday, with a market value of $104.4 billion.Earlier, according to informed sources, the Trump administration is in negotiations with Intel (INTC.O) with the aim of seeking a U.S. government stake.
